1. After the heating period, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool naturally to room temperature (approximately 3-4 hours).

steps: 1. Once cooled, remove the crucible from the furnace and carefully extract the solid sample.
2. Use sandpaper (grit 400) to smooth the surface of the sample, if necessary.
